attributes.action: You are doing MORE damage to the country than she was to the party, SO WHY ARE  YOU NOT GOING TOO?
attributes.additional_details: If 'doing damage' (as opposed to committing fraud or theft) is a legitimate reason to go then you should have gone a long, long time ago, so that a politician who is not a congenital liar (and there are not very many of them around) can have a go at dealing with the electorate on a truthful basis.  You can put that right IMMEDIATELY 'UTurn Dave' by simply removing yourself.
